医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
产前接触 COVID-19 对儿童神经发育结果的影响有限研究表明，产前接触 SARS-CoV-2 与婴儿的调节行为略有改善有关，但对神经发育没有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Limited-impact-of-prenatal-COVID-19-exposure-on-child-neurodevelopmental-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Limited-impact-of-prenatal-COVID-19-exposure-on-child-neurodevelopmental-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ba9173e-898f-4e52-9b36-946d2af3ad5c Tue, 12 Nov 2024 04:35:00 -0500 Limited impact of prenatal COVID-19 exposure on child neurodevelopmental outcomes
Mursla Bio 加入欧洲领先联盟，推进基于细胞外囊泡科学的临床应用Mursla Bio 是细胞外囊泡 (EV) 科学领域的领导者，其使命是通过动态活检技术的力量显着改善高危患者的癌症结果，该公司宣布已受邀加入欧洲领先联盟 EVEREST。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Mursla-Bio-joins-leading-European-consortium-to-advance-clinical-applications-based-on-extracellular-vesicle-science.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Mursla-Bio-joins-leading-European-consortium-to-advance-clinical-applications-based-on-extracellular-vesicle-science.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a641b2ed-0e6c-47cf-bb48-98bff8014398 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 04:31:00 -0500 Mursla Bio joins leading European consortium to advance clinical applications based on extracellular vesicle science
超加工食品与青少年体重增加和健康状况不佳有关这项研究调查了超加工食品和屏幕时间，考察了它们对青少年体重和健康的影响，同时考虑了母亲教育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Ultra-processed-food-linked-to-weight-gain-and-lower-well-being-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Ultra-processed-food-linked-to-weight-gain-and-lower-well-being-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdbc1335-0fce-44a0-8a50-0895a6593e61 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 04:04:00 -0500 Ultra-processed food linked to weight gain and lower well-being in adolescents
甲基GPT解开年龄和疾病预测的DNA秘密研究人员开发了 MmethylGPT，这是一种基于 Transformer 的强大模型，可识别 DNA 甲基化模式，从而实现具有临床潜力的高龄和疾病预测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/MmethylGPT-unlocks-DNA-secrets-for-age-and-disease-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/MmethylGPT-unlocks-DNA-secrets-for-age-and-disease-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=958119df-4c08-4150-a20f-964e8ba53ca3 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 22:43:00 -0500 MethylGPT unlocks DNA secrets for age and disease prediction
基于人工智能的超声软件高精度指导分娩决策一种基于人工智能的新软件已经开发出来，可以与超声波设备集成，通过提供有关婴儿头部位置的精确、实时信息来“指导”分娩。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/AI-based-ultrasound-software-guides-childbirth-decisions-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/AI-based-ultrasound-software-guides-childbirth-decisions-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b7a3bfe-d631-4467-ae8c-562dc3491d56 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 22:16:00 -0500 AI-based ultrasound software guides childbirth decisions with high accuracy
革命性的人工智能根据 DNA 模式预测衰老和疾病研究人员开发了 CpGPT，这是一种用于 DNA 甲基化分析的新型基础模型，可捕获序列、位置和表观遗传背景，以预测衰老和疾病风险。该模型在估算缺失数据和改善死亡率和发病率预测方面取得了突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Revolutionary-AI-predicts-aging-and-disease-from-DNA-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Revolutionary-AI-predicts-aging-and-disease-from-DNA-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88d38ced-e2d3-45bb-aabc-685369687e00 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 22:12:00 -0500 Revolutionary AI predicts aging and disease from DNA patterns
研究表明大麻酚可增强大鼠的睡眠悉尼大学科学家的研究发现大麻植物中的一种成分可以改善睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Cannabinol-enhances-sleep-in-rats-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Cannabinol-enhances-sleep-in-rats-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e7216af-5724-4f06-8245-d7b675ca2f1a Mon, 11 Nov 2024 22:12:00 -0500 Cannabinol enhances sleep in rats, study shows
对患有前列腺癌的老年男性的过度治疗引发担忧根据 Cedars-Sinai 领导的一项新研究，越来越多的患有中危和高危前列腺癌的美国老年男性正在接受带有副作用风险的治疗，这些副作用可能会显着降低生活质量而不延长寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Overtreatment-of-older-men-with-prostate-cancer-raises-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Overtreatment-of-older-men-with-prostate-cancer-raises-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4cbddbe-9c9e-4849-905d-56bb308396ff Mon, 11 Nov 2024 22:08:00 -0500 Overtreatment of older men with prostate cancer raises concerns
研究表明单个缺陷 BRCA1 基因如何加速癌症发展人们继承了每个基因的两个拷贝——；父母双方各一份 -；一种进化的自动防故障装置，即使其中一个无法发挥作用，也能确保生存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-shows-how-a-single-defective-BRCA1-gene-accelerates-cancer-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Study-shows-how-a-single-defective-BRCA1-gene-accelerates-cancer-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=010e0f51-5c1f-41ce-b7b4-70262395bafe Mon, 11 Nov 2024 22:06:00 -0500 Study shows how a single defective BRCA1 gene accelerates cancer development
怀孕期间早期接种 RSV 疫苗可为新生儿提供最佳保护目前的指南建议孕妇接种呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 疫苗，这种病毒通常会在大多数成年人中引起轻微的感冒样症状，但在怀孕 32 至 36 周期间对婴儿可能致命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Early-RSV-vaccination-in-pregnancy-provides-best-protection-for-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241111/Early-RSV-vaccination-in-pregnancy-provides-best-protection-for-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a11b0dc-2950-45d7-a51a-bd5a6dd1d9d2 Mon, 11 Nov 2024 22:02:00 -0500 Early RSV vaccination in pregnancy provides best protection for newborns
